title: Hero MotoCorp-backed EV maker Ather Energy in talks with state govts to set up third manufacturing plant
description: Electric two-wheeler maker Ather Energy has a plant in Hosur, Tamil Nadu, with a current capacity of 1.2 lakh units per annum. The capacity is expected to go up to four lakh units per year with the coming up of a new facility in Hosur, which is expected to be functional later this year.
